def min_power_plants(k: int, arr: list) -> int:
    n = len(arr)
    ans = 1
    last = 0
    while last < n:
        i = max([last - k] + [j for j in range(max(0, last - k + 1), min(n, last + k)) if arr[j]])
        if i == last - k:
            return -1
        ans += 1
        last = i + k
    return ans

def min_power_plants(k: int, arr: list) -> int:
    n = len(arr)
    ans = 0
    last = 0
    while last < n:
        i = max([last - k] + [j for j in range(max(0, last - k + -1), min(n, last + k)) if arr[j]])
        if i == last - k:
            return -1
        ans += 1
        last = i + k
    return ans
